questionText:
Become a citizen scientist in Brazil and help us to record mass mating events in the mangrove crabs Ucides cordatus and Cardisoma guanhumi, in relation to the moon, between November and April each year.

This information will help to improve Brazilian fisheries legislation which prohibits the capture of these crabs during mass mating events. For more information click on the menu.

Click on the below pictures to share your observations for the respective species.
